org.lobobrowser.gui
Interface ContentListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
ContentAdapter
public interface ContentListener
extends java.util.EventListener

A listener of content events.

See Also:
FramePanel.addContentListener(ContentListener), FramePanel.getComponentContent()

Field Summary
static ContentListener[] EMPTY_ARRAY
           
 
Method Summary
 void contentSet(ContentEvent event)
          Called as soon as the content has been set in a FramePanel.
 

Field Detail

EMPTY_ARRAY

static final ContentListener[] EMPTY_ARRAY
Method Detail

contentSet

void contentSet(ContentEvent event)
Called as soon as the content has been set in a FramePanel. Note that content can be set before the originating document has been fully loaded, for example when incremental rendering is performed.

Parameters:
event - The content event.
